page.title: 15Lifestyles and Attitudes
page.content: During a series of interviews with a cross section of people it was found that most of the inhabitants of the houses in the area came from Hamilton or thereabouts, however a few of the people had originally come from places such as East Kilbride, Glasgow, Larkhall, Edinburgh, Wishaw, Blackwood, Bothwell and one family surprisingly enough came from Newcastle. The average length of time that people had lived in the area was 12 years. The age of the houses varied in the different parts of the area- that is, there was a sliding scale of ages which ranged from 14 years to 40 years. Most of the people we inter- viewed had their family living nearby in places such as Silvertonhill and East Kilbride. a small number of these families had no relations living nearby- one family was the one who had
